visualization_explanation: The dataset uses categorical stacking with ordinal atmospheric layers. Synthetic unity values (all =1) enable percentage stacking visualization despite non-proportional real heights. Data quality prioritizes didactic labeling over physical accuracy. The column chart maximizes data-ink ratio by hiding axes and using direct labeling. Cairo's principles are applied through position-based encoding (vertical stacking order) and color-free differentiation. Equal segment distribution creates false proportional perception but serves mnemonic purpose for layer sequence memorization.
